title: Constand recounts graphic details of Cosby attack
text:
Constand recounts graphic details of Cosby attack Friday, April 13, 2018 - 01:25 
The woman whose accusation brought Bill Cosby to trial in Pennsylvania on sex-assault charges testified on Friday that the comedian drugged and raped her in 2004 and she was terrified to tell anyone for months afterward.   
The woman whose accusation brought Bill Cosby to trial in Pennsylvania on sex-assault charges testified on Friday that the comedian drugged and raped her in 2004 and she was terrified to tell anyone for months afterward.  //reut.rs/2HysAUy
